title.rendered: Innovative Cancer Therapy for Tomorrow® unveils exciting new initiatives for its 41st annual conference

content.rendered:
These initiatives reflect CFS’s commitment to advancing oncology education, fostering a sense of community, and recognizing the invaluable contributions of health care professionals.

CRANBURY, N.J., Oct. 25, 2023 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — Physicians’ Education Resource®, LLC (PER®), a top educational resource for health care professionals across all specialties to advance patient care, is thrilled to announce a series of innovative initiatives set to elevate the attendee experience at this year’s Chemotherapy Foundation Symposium (CFS). This three day in-person conference will take place at New York Hilton Midtown, New York, from Nov. 8-10, 2023.

“At CFS, we are committed to advancing oncology education and fostering a sense of community within the health care industry,” said Jim Palatine, president of PER. “This year, we are taking bold steps to elevate the attendee experience and honor the remarkable individuals who make a difference in the fight against cancer.”

In a unique endeavor, CFS has partnered with talented street artists to pay tribute to three exceptional Oncology Heroes. The heroes featured over the course of the symposium represent a Hematology Hero from The Tisch Cancer Institute at Mount Sinai, Breast Hero from Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center, and Lung Hero from Sidney Kimmel Comprehensive Cancer Center at Johns Hopkins. Each day of the event will highlight one of these heroes and bring their stories and contributions to the forefront.

The creative canvas of street art will serve as a dynamic medium for showcasing the incredible journeys of our Oncology Heroes. Attendees will have the privilege of witnessing the artistic process, the metamorphosis of a blank canvas into a powerful masterpiece that encapsulates the spirit of innovation in cancer care. It is not just art, but a profound narrative of hope, courage, and dedication.

Our partnership with gifted street artists amplifies the depth of our tribute to these remarkable heroes, each of whom has made an invaluable contribution to the field of oncology. Through the skillful strokes and vibrant colors, we pay homage to their unwavering commitment to the fight against cancer.

CFS will also host a Movember-themed pop-up. Attendees can indulge in a unique barbershop photo set experience, capturing their “Movember journey” starting from the conference. Participants will be encouraged to share their photos on their social platforms, tagging PER. For each tagged post, PER will donate $10 to support men’s health initiatives.

For more information on these new initiatives and to register, click here. Use code EXPERIENCE for free admission.

About Physicians’ Education Resource

Physicians’ Education Resource, LLC (PER), is committed to advancing patient care through professional education. Accredited by the Accreditation Council for Continuing Medical Education (ACCME) and approved as a nursing continuing education provider by the California Board of Registered Nursing, PER is the educational resource of choice for live and online activities for health care professionals across all specialties. Based on identified needs and practice gaps, PER provides high-quality, evidence-based activities featuring leading national and international faculty with a focus on practice-changing advances and standards of care in treatment and disease management.

Media Contact:
Lauren Garafola
MJH Life Sciences®
lgarafola@mjhlifesciences.com

A photo accompanying this announcement is available at https://www.globenewswire.com/NewsRoom/AttachmentNg/fe7a5dd8-0626-4c06-a4dc-0ff35aa6bd4a


CFS has partnered with talented street artists to pay tribute to three exceptional Oncology Heroes

This artistic endeavor allows attendees to witness the creative process and the transformation of a blank canvas into a powerful piece of art that reflects the spirit of innovation in cancer care.

You just read:

News Provided By

October 25, 2023, 15:09 GMT
